name: Skies of Iris
description:
Skies of Iris is an action role-playing game with a strong emphasis on co-operative gameplay. Players each take on a different role in the form of four unique characters with special strengths, abilities, and weaknesses. Players are then tasked with defeating powerful monsters by working together, covering each other’s weaknesses, and being wary of each monsters distinct and deadly behaviors.

In Skies of Iris you and three other friends can  jump into the action of an epic boss battle together!

Requirements: 4 Players and 4 Xbox controllers

Find the progress for our game on twitter @BackyardGamesCA !
